title: Barrett and Snake Discover True Sorrow! MGS3 (Part 5)
description:
I’m part five of our Metal Gear Solid 3 playthrough Barrett sets off through the sewers to escape Volgin’s base and continue the journey of Naked Snake. After run-ins with Ocelot and the Sorrow, Naked Snake regroups and goes back after the Shagohod and Volgin!
